sentence.Network_en: The little boat was skimming across the sunlit surface of the bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 一叶小舟正轻轻掠过阳光下的海湾。

sentence.Network_en: Her house has two big sunlit rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的房子有两间向阳的带落地窗的大屋子。

entry.def: Sunlit places are brightly lit by the sun.
